questions.question: Confirm the Equipment with below provided image.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again.
confirm is there any physical Damage of the Equipment
prepare Damage / Incident and Missing report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check whether the wall out let is provided with the AC Voltage of 230.
kindly shift the Equipment to another place where the AC voltage of 230 is provided
check and confirm whether the Input (230 VAC) and Output (12 VDC) are available at the adapter.
replace the adapter with a new one
replace the Control Board with a new one
check and confirm whether the machine turned ON but blower is not working.
open the equipment as shown in the video. Check and confirm for any obstructions in the Blower Assemble.
clean the Blower assemble accordingly
check and confirm whether the voltage is available to the Blower Motor Assemble.
replace the Blower Motor Assemble with a new one
replace the Control Board with a new one
check and confirm whether there is a CPAP Output available.
check and confirm whether there is any obstruction in the inlet filter.
clean the inlet filter and fix it back.
replace it with a new one
If the problem has not yet solved, contact the Technical team for any other assistance through video call.
Thanks
